member.name: TS_SELECTION_ANCHOR
member.summary: The TS_SELECTION_ANCHOR structure contains anchor-based text selection data.

member.name: TS_SELECTION_ANCHOR.paStart
member.summary: Contains the start anchor of the selection.

member.name: TS_SELECTION_ANCHOR.paEnd
member.summary: Contains the end anchor of the selection.

member.name: TS_SELECTION_ANCHOR.style
member.summary: A structure that contains additional selection data.
